body_content.explanation: In basketball, an inbounds pass is thrown by a player standing outside the court (= playing area) back into the court, especially to start play after it has stopped:
examples: He threw the inbounds pass the length of the floor.

body_content.explanation: within a managed area that is intended for skiing:
examples: They get their students skiing efficiently and confidently on inbounds terrain.
Australian ski tourists throng to the in-bounds slopes at the Niseko resort region.
